extension.summary: [COLOR ff0084ff]E[/COLOR]xtended [COLOR ff0084ff]I[/COLOR]nfo [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]od
extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] for playback and library functions.
extension.summary: [COLOR ff0084ff]E[/COLOR]xtended [COLOR ff0084ff]I[/COLOR]nfo [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]od
extension.description: Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Einfacher heller oder dunkler Skin für Full-HD Bildschirme mit vielen Extras.
Απλό και πλήρες, φωτεινό ή σκοτεινό κέλυφος, σχεδιασμένο για οθόνες υψηλής ανάλυσης (Full HD).
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark colour skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Un skin simple, de color claro u oscuro, y con todas las funciones, diseñado para televisores Full HD.
Skins clair ou foncé simple et complet conçu pour des écrans TV Full HD.
Habillage simple et complet, de couleur claire ou sombre, conçu pour les écrans à HD intégrale.
מעטפת פשוטה ורבת תכונות בצבעים כהים או בהירים המותאמת במיוחד למסכים באבחנת Full HD.
Skin dal colore bianco o nero, semplice e completa, progettata per TV Full HD
모든 기능을 지원하는 단순한 스킨으로 밝은 색상과 어두운 색상을 지원하며 Full HD TV 용으로 디자인하였습니다.
Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.
Kulit ringkas dan warna cerah atau gelap berfitur penuh untuk skrin TV HD Penuh.
Eenvoudige en volledig gekenmerkte lichte of donkere skin ontworpen voor Full-HD TV-schermen.
Prosta, w pełni funkcjonalna skóra zawierająca jasny i mroczny motyw, zaprojektowana dla ekranu telewizyjnych Full HD.
Skin simples e completa nas cores lihgt ou dark para telas Full HD TV.
Costum simplu și complet pe alb sau pe negru proiectat pentru ecrane tv de înaltă definiție.

Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.

extension.description: X1 е потребителски интерфейс за Kodi. Целта му е да Ви удовлетвори в максимална степен, чрез своя уникален, бърз и удобен интерфейс, като същевременно не Ви лишава от най-новите функционалности на Kodi.

X1 ist eine Benutzeroberfläche für das Kodi Media Center. Das Ziel von X1 ist es, Ihr Unterhaltungserlebnis mit der schnellen, einzigartigen und einheitlichen Oberfläche zusammen mit den neusten Kodi-Features zu maximieren.

Το X1 είναι ένα Γραφικό Περιβάλλον Εργασίας (GUI) για το Κέντρο Πολυμέσων Kodi. Στόχος του X1 είναι να μεγιστοποιήσει την ψυχαγωγική σας εμπειρία μέσω του γρήγορου, μοναδικού και ενοποιημένου περιβάλλοντός του, που περιλαμβάνει όλες τις νέες λειτουργίες του Kodi.

This is the 6th generation of X1 skin for Kodi. X1 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of X1 skin for Kodi. X1 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of X1 skin for Kodi. X1 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!

This is the 6th generation of X1 skin for Kodi. X1 6 is aiming to maximize your Kodi entertainment experience with its NEW Unique, Clean and Elegant interface while providing users a highly customization level and lots of cool features!
X1 es una interfaz gráfica para Kodi. La meta de X1 es maximizar la experiencia de Kodi con su interfaz única, rápida y unificada y las últimas novedades de Kodi.
X1 est un thème pour Kodi Media Center. Le but de X1 est de maximiser votre expérience Kodi avec son interface rapide, fluide et unique pour toutes les fonctionnalités d'Kodi.

X1 est une IUG pour le centre multimédia Kodi. Le but de X1 est de maximiser votre expérience de divertissement Kodi avec une interface rapide, unique et unifiée, ainsi qu'avec toutes les dernières fonctions de Kodi.
X1 e unha GUI para o Centro Multimedia Kodi. O obxectivo de X1 é que goce ó máximo da experiencia en entretemento no Kodi, unha interface única e unificada xunto con todas as funcións do Kodi.
המעטפת X1 היא ממשק משתמש עבור Kodi. מטרת X1 היא להעצים את חוויית השימוש ב־Kodi בעזרת ממשק מהיר, ייחודי ואחיד עם כל היכולות החדשות של Kodi.
A X1 egy felszín az Kodi média centerhez. A X1 célja hogy maximalizálja az Kodi élvezeti értékét az egyedi, gyors és egyszerű felülettel és az Kodi legújabb fejlesztéseinek felhasználásával.

X1 è un'interfaccia per Kodi Media Center. L'obiettivo di X1 è di massimizzare la tua esperienza di intrattenimento con Kodi con la sua interfaccia veloce, unica ed unificata insieme alle nuove caratteristiche di Kodi.
X1는 Kodi Media Center의 그래픽 인터페이스입니다. X1의 목표는 모든 최신 기능들에 대해 빠르고 독특하며 일관된 인터페이스를 제공하여 Kodi 엔터테인먼트 경험을 최대화하는데 있습니다.
X1 Kodi Media Center GUI. X1 tikslas yra maksimaliai padidinti Kodi pramogą, unikali ir vieninga sąsaja kartu su visomis naujausiomis Kodi funkcijomis.
X1 ialah GUI untuk Pusat Media Kodi. Matlamat X1 ialah untuk pengalaman hiburan Kodi yang maksimum dengan antaramuka yang pantas, unik dan sepadu bersama-sama dengan semua fitur terkini Kodi.

X1 is een gebruikersinterface voor Kodi Media Center. Het doel van X1 is jouw Kodi entertainmentbeleving te maximaliseren met zijn snelle, unieke en universele interface samen met de laatste mogelijkheden van Kodi

X1 to graficzny interfejs użytkownika dla Kodi Media Center. Celem X1 jest dostarczenie maksymalnej wygody użytkowania Kodi z wykorzystaniem szybkiego, unikalnego oraz ujednoliconego interfejsu, wraz z wszystkimi najnowszymi funkcjonalnościami Kodi.
X1 é uma interface gráfica para o Kodi. A meta de X1 é maximizar sua experiência de entretenimento com o Kodi através de sua interface única, rápida e integrada com todos os últimos recursos do Kodi.
X1 - это обложка для Kodi. Ee быстрый, неповторимый и законченный интерфейс вместе возможностями Kodi позволят вам получить максимальное удовольствие от вашей цифровой коллекции.
X1 är ett GUI för Kodi Media Center. Syftet med X1 är att fullborda din Kodi upplevelse med ett snabbt, unikt och samlat gränssnitt tillsammans med de allra senaste funktionerna av Kodi.
X1, Kodi Media Center için bir GKA'dır. X1'nun hedefi, hızlı ve benzersiz arayüzüyle, Kodi eğlence deneyiminizi en son ve bütün özellikleriyle maksimuma çıkarmaktır.
X1是一个Kodi媒体中心的图形界面. X1的目标是通过快速, 独特和统一的界面以及最新的Kodi特性, 来最大化你的Kodi娱乐体验.

addon.name: Eminence 2.0 MOD
addon.provider-name: jurialmunkey - Mod by Guilouz - Mod by Alanon

extension.summary: Clean, clear, simple, modern.
Clair, simple et moderne.
extension.description: Eminence is a skin that aims to be clean, clear, simple and modern.
Eminence est un thème qui vise à être clair, simple et moderne.
extension.news:
Changelog:
[B]2.4.2[/B] 1. Huge viewtype overhaul. 2. Showcase fix. 3. RSS font size enlargement. 4. Ported Settings screen. 5. Ported Showcase Widget. 6. Tweaks to the info screen. 7. Small OSD fix. 8. Small Hub fix. 9. Script duration updates.
[B]2.4.1[/B] 1. Fixed widget type bug. 2. Fix for viewtype lock.
[B]2.4[/B] 1. Further viewtype fixes. 2. Music artwork overhaul. 3. Add-on Info dialogue tweaks. 4. Light theme info fix. 5. Light theme busy dialogue tweak. 6. Set Icon fix. 7. Added manfeed's Videolyrics Plus. 8. Showcase tweaks. 9. Tweaked playlist background options. 10. Added Low List view. 11. Rotation label bugfix. 12. Support for Artwork Beef add-on. 13. Skin Backup workaround. 14. French translation overhaul (by Kelexel) 15. Light theme dark interface tweaks. 16. Info and flags redundancy fixes. 17. Caching OSD fix.
[B]2.3.9.1[/B] 1. Add-on browsing quick-fix.
[B]2.3.9[/B] 1. Busy Dialog tweak. 2. Tweaked viewtypes conditions. 3. Fixed add-on loading artefacts. 4. Small log error fixes (syntax). 5. Home menu header is now hideable. 6. Fixed logo and flags bugs. 7. Video Info ratings tweak. 8. Video Info darken effect. 9. QuickNav tweak. 10. Subtitle Sync tweak. 11. Added Hebrew translation (scofield272)!
[B]2.3.8[/B] 1. Context menu support for Library Editor Script. 2. Context menu support for SimplePlaylists. 3. PVR OSD fixes. 4. Darkened the dim option. 5. Random Backgrounds fix. 6. Scrollbar fixes. 7. Another attempt at RSS animation fix. 8. OSD Logo fix. 9. Poster Border fix.
[B]2.3.7[/B] 1. RSS animation tweaks. 2. RightList artist thumbs fix. 3. LiveTV OSD fix. 4. Flag fallbacks fixes. 5. Added plot outline option. 6. Alternate RightList for music tweak. 7. RightList for video content.
[B]2.3.6[/B] 1. Added a duration setting for home widgets. 2. Hub widget fixes.
[B]2.3.5[/B] 1. RightList tweaks. 2. Flags tweaks. 3. Spanish translation added!
[B]2.3.4[/B] 1. RightList fixes. 2. Skin settings reorganisation. 3. Fixes for the French translation. 4. Significant Hub widget improvements.
[B]2.3.3[/B] 1. Updated a required add-on listing. 2. Added a preliminary RightList view. 3. Decreased the Home gradient. 4. Fixes for the French translation. 5. Disabled Black and Sollid colour themes (for now).
[B]2.3.2[/B] 1. Added a vertical/horizontal context menu switch. 2. Widget handling improved. 3. RSS bar for Text Only home.
[B]2.3.1[/B] 1. More music views. 2. Updated French strings (Thanks to Kelexel!) 3. Scrollbar fixes. 4. Skin performance fixes. 5. User rating fix. 6. Fulscreen setting added.
[B]2.3[/B] 1. Improved extrathumbs handling. 2. Improved the new context menu. 3. Improved rating icons. 4. Improved userratings. 5. Added an info menu in the PVR OSD. 6. Added screenshots for the addon.xml. 7. Default highlight is back to blue. 8. Dependencies version bump. 9. Updated manfeed's lyrics to V2. 10. Show/Hide CD case option. 11. Artist logo improvements. 12. Music OSD bugfix. 13. Adjusted the skin background colour effects.
[B]2.2.7[/B] 1. Added a new context menu (testing!). 2. Added a rotating backgrounds timer. 3. Added extrathumbs support. 4. Addon settings button fixes.
[B]2.2.6[/B] 1. QuickNav fixes. 2. More PVR fixes. 3. Other small fixes.
[B]2.2.5[/B] 1. Better mouse support for the skin settings. 2. Subtitle menu fixes. 3. Improved english language strings. 4. Several small PVR fixes and tweaks.
[B]2.2.4[/B] 1. Added setting for onback command. 2. Small language fix.
[B]2.2.3[/B] 1. Tweaks for the light colourscheme. 2. Version bump for the github experiment.
[B]2.2.2[/B] 1. Added an opacity setting for the OSD.
[B]2.2.1[/B] 1. Added a clickable seekbar. 2. Added new colour themes. 3. Shortened the skin name. 4. Added new icons. 5. Tweaked the subtitles menu. 6. Small fixes.
[B]2.2[/B] 1. Added a custom dialog for the view selector. 2. Added new selector thumbnails. 3. Added "Plain List" view. 4. Added "Lovefilm" view. 5. Added "Info List 3" view. 6. Added "Medium Icons" view. 7. Added an improved NextUp PostPlay skin. 8. Added "disc.png" artwork for Music OSD. 9. Added more flags settings. 10. Added Director/Revenue info for the movie library. 11. Added Forced Views for most content types. 12. Fixed hub logos. 13. Fixed movieset overlay info. 14. Fixed subtitle dialog behaviour. 15. Fixed some minor dialogs. 16. General speed improvements. 17. Improved Showcase posters. 18. Improved video thumbs. 19. Improved Header colours. 20. Improved hub back actions. 21. Improved the Line Labels.
[B]2.1[/B] 1. Added manfeed's lyrics. 2. Fixes for Hub widgets. 3. Fixes for weather. 4. Added music genre and record label resources. 5. Added record label icons in dialog infos. 6. Refined view types and categories. 7. Added the old Hub menu as an option. 8. Improved QuickNav and submenu handling. 9. Functional Genre widget.
[B]2.0.9[/B] 1. Some stubborn bugs squashed.
[B]2.0.8[/B] 1. Fixed dialog buttons. 2. Fixed playlist dialog. 3. Added some new animations. 4. Mouse supported submenu.
[B]2.0.7[/B] 1. Small fixes.
[B]2.0.6[/B] 1. Added a fake disc with writing in Music OSD. 2. Repaired the repeat button. 3. Removed duplicate spinner textures. 4. Added more dependencies. 5. Settings window shortcuts for OpenELEC, LibreELEC, and OSMC. 6. Added a record button to the PVR OSD. 7. Added Kodi's Privacy Policy display. 8. Code updates.
[B]2.0.5[/B] 1. Tweaked the cast list. 2. Added and improved skin dependencies.
[B]2.0.4[/B] 1. Color Picker fix.
[B]2.0.3[/B] 1. Power menu fix. 2. ColorPicker fixes. 3. Moved the busy spinner. 4. Moved the user ratings under the clock.
[B]2.0.2[/B] 1. Revert header change. 2. New cast info in the OSD. 3. More code updates.
[B]2.0.1[/B] 1. Quick bugfix.
[B]2.0[/B] 1. Added a Quick navigation shortcuts menu. 2. Further code updates from Eminence 2.5. 3. Fix for Library selection buttons. 4. A fix for true hidden headers. 5. PVR visual fixes. 6. Overhaul of the available views. 7. Further mouse control improvements.
[B]1.9.2[/B] 1. Small updates for the backgrounds. 2. Changed position for the user rating.
[B]1.9.1[/B] 1. Flags and other modifications for Hubs. 2. Updated skin support for Extended Info dialogs.
[B]1.9[/B] 1. Added a new Netflix view for video items (Arctic - Danvers). 2. New spinner textures (from Arctic - Danvers). 3. Added the user rating system for music and videos. 4. Overhauled and fixed the info screens. 5. Ported the new dialog design from Eminence 2.5. 6. Ported the Settings screen from Eminence 2.5. 7. More mouse optimizations for the setting menus. 8. Added an option to use music artwork backgrounds. 9. Ported the window shadows from Eminence 2.5. 10. Fixed a weather widget bug.
[B]1.8.3[/B] 1. Updated the setting labels for Krypton, and improved mouse support.
[B]1.8.2[/B] 1. More code updates and fixes. 2. Added new info for addons.
[B]1.8.1[/B] 1. New skin icon. 2. Begun updating the code to reflect soon-to-be deprecated string bools. 3. A bunch of small fixes to the code. 4. Some new flags.
[B]1.8[/B] 1. Improvements and fixes for the Video OSD. 2. Moved my portion of the changelog to the addon.xml. 3. Restored the addoninfo changelog button for the "news" value. 4. Added a setting for duration formats. "script.duration_axbmcuser" now required. 5. Updated required addons list. 6. Small fixes for the Showcase view.
[B]1.7[/B] 1. Improved vertical and horizontal scrolling. 2. Added letter scrollbar (by marcelvedt and the Aeon Madnox team!). 3. Added Player.Process dialog for Krypton. 4. Adapted the game controlers file from Eminence 2.5 (needs to be tested). 5. Fixed some small glitches.
[B]1.6[/B] 1. Added animated artwork! 2. Cleaned up inconsistent code. 3. Added proper settings and labels for various new features.
[B]1.5.1[/B] 1. Better flags icons and other small fixes.
[B]1.5[/B] 1. Added support for rotating ExtraFanart with Skin Helper! 2. Fixed the Krypton settings screen. 3. Added RottenTomatoes, Metacritic and IMDb ratings to the VideoInfo screen. 4. Updated the Dialogs and added the "Get more..." and "Cancel" buttons. 5. Added the Showcase view from Eminence 2.5! 6. Redesigned the way Video OSD works. 7. Fixed most of the Skin Helper properties. 8. Altered flag aspect ratio. 9. Fixed and improved the movieset display. 10. Redesigned the large submenu. 11. Tweaked the timestamp bubble. 12. Removed the changelog button from the addon info screen. 13. Darkened the interface dffuse graphic. 14. Repaired the subitle offset slider. 15. Modded the way source flags are displayed while playing. 16. Changed the OSD info button function.

extension.summary: Einfacher heller oder dunkler Skin für Full-HD Bildschirme mit vielen Extras.
Απλό και πλήρες, φωτεινό ή σκοτεινό κέλυφος, σχεδιασμένο για οθόνες υψηλής ανάλυσης (Full HD).
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark colour skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Un skin simple, de color claro u oscuro, y con todas las funciones, diseñado para televisores Full HD.
Skins clair ou foncé simple et complet conçu pour des écrans TV Full HD.
Habillage simple et complet, de couleur claire ou sombre, conçu pour les écrans à HD intégrale.
מעטפת פשוטה ורבת תכונות בצבעים כהים או בהירים המותאמת במיוחד למסכים באבחנת Full HD.
Skin dal colore bianco o nero, semplice e completa, progettata per TV Full HD
모든 기능을 지원하는 단순한 스킨으로 밝은 색상과 어두운 색상을 지원하며 Full HD TV 용으로 디자인하였습니다.
Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.
Kulit ringkas dan warna cerah atau gelap berfitur penuh untuk skrin TV HD Penuh.
Eenvoudige en volledig gekenmerkte lichte of donkere skin ontworpen voor Full-HD TV-schermen.
Prosta, w pełni funkcjonalna skóra zawierająca jasny i mroczny motyw, zaprojektowana dla ekranu telewizyjnych Full HD.
Skin simples e completa nas cores lihgt ou dark para telas Full HD TV.
Costum simplu și complet pe alb sau pe negru proiectat pentru ecrane tv de înaltă definiție.

Skin dal colore bianco o nero, semplice e completa, progettata per TV Full HD

Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.
Kulit ringkas dan warna cerah atau gelap berfitur penuh direka untuk skrin TV HD Penuh.
Eenvoudige en volledig gekenmerkte lichte of donkere skin ontworpen voor Full-HD TV-schermen.
Prosta, w pełni funkcjonalna skóra zawierająca jasny i mroczny motyw, zaprojektowana dla ekranu telewizyjnych Full HD.

addon.name: Urban Essence
addon.provider-name: jurialmunkey - Mod by Guilouz - Mod by Alanon

extension.summary: Clean, clear, simple, modern.
Clair, simple et moderne.
extension.description: Eminence is a skin that aims to be clean, clear, simple and modern.
Eminence est un thème qui vise à être clair, simple et moderne.
extension.news:
Changelog:
[B]2.4.2[/B] 1. Huge viewtype overhaul. 2. Showcase fix. 3. RSS font size enlargement. 4. Ported Settings screen. 5. Ported Showcase Widget. 6. Tweaks to the info screen. 7. Small OSD fix. 8. Small Hub fix. 9. Script duration updates.
[B]2.4.1[/B] 1. Fixed widget type bug. 2. Fix for viewtype lock.
[B]2.4[/B] 1. Further viewtype fixes. 2. Music artwork overhaul. 3. Add-on Info dialogue tweaks. 4. Light theme info fix. 5. Light theme busy dialogue tweak. 6. Set Icon fix. 7. Added manfeed's Videolyrics Plus. 8. Showcase tweaks. 9. Tweaked playlist background options. 10. Added Low List view. 11. Rotation label bugfix. 12. Support for Artwork Beef add-on. 13. Skin Backup workaround. 14. French translation overhaul (by Kelexel) 15. Light theme dark interface tweaks. 16. Info and flags redundancy fixes. 17. Caching OSD fix.
[B]2.3.9.1[/B] 1. Add-on browsing quick-fix.
[B]2.3.9[/B] 1. Busy Dialog tweak. 2. Tweaked viewtypes conditions. 3. Fixed add-on loading artefacts. 4. Small log error fixes (syntax). 5. Home menu header is now hideable. 6. Fixed logo and flags bugs. 7. Video Info ratings tweak. 8. Video Info darken effect. 9. QuickNav tweak. 10. Subtitle Sync tweak. 11. Added Hebrew translation (scofield272)!
[B]2.3.8[/B] 1. Context menu support for Library Editor Script. 2. Context menu support for SimplePlaylists. 3. PVR OSD fixes. 4. Darkened the dim option. 5. Random Backgrounds fix. 6. Scrollbar fixes. 7. Another attempt at RSS animation fix. 8. OSD Logo fix. 9. Poster Border fix.
[B]2.3.7[/B] 1. RSS animation tweaks. 2. RightList artist thumbs fix. 3. LiveTV OSD fix. 4. Flag fallbacks fixes. 5. Added plot outline option. 6. Alternate RightList for music tweak. 7. RightList for video content.
[B]2.3.6[/B] 1. Added a duration setting for home widgets. 2. Hub widget fixes.
[B]2.3.5[/B] 1. RightList tweaks. 2. Flags tweaks. 3. Spanish translation added!
[B]2.3.4[/B] 1. RightList fixes. 2. Skin settings reorganisation. 3. Fixes for the French translation. 4. Significant Hub widget improvements.
[B]2.3.3[/B] 1. Updated a required add-on listing. 2. Added a preliminary RightList view. 3. Decreased the Home gradient. 4. Fixes for the French translation. 5. Disabled Black and Sollid colour themes (for now).
[B]2.3.2[/B] 1. Added a vertical/horizontal context menu switch. 2. Widget handling improved. 3. RSS bar for Text Only home.
[B]2.3.1[/B] 1. More music views. 2. Updated French strings (Thanks to Kelexel!) 3. Scrollbar fixes. 4. Skin performance fixes. 5. User rating fix. 6. Fulscreen setting added.
[B]2.3[/B] 1. Improved extrathumbs handling. 2. Improved the new context menu. 3. Improved rating icons. 4. Improved userratings. 5. Added an info menu in the PVR OSD. 6. Added screenshots for the addon.xml. 7. Default highlight is back to blue. 8. Dependencies version bump. 9. Updated manfeed's lyrics to V2. 10. Show/Hide CD case option. 11. Artist logo improvements. 12. Music OSD bugfix. 13. Adjusted the skin background colour effects.
[B]2.2.7[/B] 1. Added a new context menu (testing!). 2. Added a rotating backgrounds timer. 3. Added extrathumbs support. 4. Addon settings button fixes.
[B]2.2.6[/B] 1. QuickNav fixes. 2. More PVR fixes. 3. Other small fixes.
[B]2.2.5[/B] 1. Better mouse support for the skin settings. 2. Subtitle menu fixes. 3. Improved english language strings. 4. Several small PVR fixes and tweaks.
[B]2.2.4[/B] 1. Added setting for onback command. 2. Small language fix.
[B]2.2.3[/B] 1. Tweaks for the light colourscheme. 2. Version bump for the github experiment.
[B]2.2.2[/B] 1. Added an opacity setting for the OSD.
[B]2.2.1[/B] 1. Added a clickable seekbar. 2. Added new colour themes. 3. Shortened the skin name. 4. Added new icons. 5. Tweaked the subtitles menu. 6. Small fixes.
[B]2.2[/B] 1. Added a custom dialog for the view selector. 2. Added new selector thumbnails. 3. Added "Plain List" view. 4. Added "Lovefilm" view. 5. Added "Info List 3" view. 6. Added "Medium Icons" view. 7. Added an improved NextUp PostPlay skin. 8. Added "disc.png" artwork for Music OSD. 9. Added more flags settings. 10. Added Director/Revenue info for the movie library. 11. Added Forced Views for most content types. 12. Fixed hub logos. 13. Fixed movieset overlay info. 14. Fixed subtitle dialog behaviour. 15. Fixed some minor dialogs. 16. General speed improvements. 17. Improved Showcase posters. 18. Improved video thumbs. 19. Improved Header colours. 20. Improved hub back actions. 21. Improved the Line Labels.
[B]2.1[/B] 1. Added manfeed's lyrics. 2. Fixes for Hub widgets. 3. Fixes for weather. 4. Added music genre and record label resources. 5. Added record label icons in dialog infos. 6. Refined view types and categories. 7. Added the old Hub menu as an option. 8. Improved QuickNav and submenu handling. 9. Functional Genre widget.
[B]2.0.9[/B] 1. Some stubborn bugs squashed.
[B]2.0.8[/B] 1. Fixed dialog buttons. 2. Fixed playlist dialog. 3. Added some new animations. 4. Mouse supported submenu.
[B]2.0.7[/B] 1. Small fixes.
[B]2.0.6[/B] 1. Added a fake disc with writing in Music OSD. 2. Repaired the repeat button. 3. Removed duplicate spinner textures. 4. Added more dependencies. 5. Settings window shortcuts for OpenELEC, LibreELEC, and OSMC. 6. Added a record button to the PVR OSD. 7. Added Kodi's Privacy Policy display. 8. Code updates.
[B]2.0.5[/B] 1. Tweaked the cast list. 2. Added and improved skin dependencies.
[B]2.0.4[/B] 1. Color Picker fix.
[B]2.0.3[/B] 1. Power menu fix. 2. ColorPicker fixes. 3. Moved the busy spinner. 4. Moved the user ratings under the clock.
[B]2.0.2[/B] 1. Revert header change. 2. New cast info in the OSD. 3. More code updates.
[B]2.0.1[/B] 1. Quick bugfix.
[B]2.0[/B] 1. Added a Quick navigation shortcuts menu. 2. Further code updates from Eminence 2.5. 3. Fix for Library selection buttons. 4. A fix for true hidden headers. 5. PVR visual fixes. 6. Overhaul of the available views. 7. Further mouse control improvements.
[B]1.9.2[/B] 1. Small updates for the backgrounds. 2. Changed position for the user rating.
[B]1.9.1[/B] 1. Flags and other modifications for Hubs. 2. Updated skin support for Extended Info dialogs.
[B]1.9[/B] 1. Added a new Netflix view for video items (Arctic - Danvers). 2. New spinner textures (from Arctic - Danvers). 3. Added the user rating system for music and videos. 4. Overhauled and fixed the info screens. 5. Ported the new dialog design from Eminence 2.5. 6. Ported the Settings screen from Eminence 2.5. 7. More mouse optimizations for the setting menus. 8. Added an option to use music artwork backgrounds. 9. Ported the window shadows from Eminence 2.5. 10. Fixed a weather widget bug.
[B]1.8.3[/B] 1. Updated the setting labels for Krypton, and improved mouse support.
[B]1.8.2[/B] 1. More code updates and fixes. 2. Added new info for addons.
[B]1.8.1[/B] 1. New skin icon. 2. Begun updating the code to reflect soon-to-be deprecated string bools. 3. A bunch of small fixes to the code. 4. Some new flags.
[B]1.8[/B] 1. Improvements and fixes for the Video OSD. 2. Moved my portion of the changelog to the addon.xml. 3. Restored the addoninfo changelog button for the "news" value. 4. Added a setting for duration formats. "script.duration_axbmcuser" now required. 5. Updated required addons list. 6. Small fixes for the Showcase view.
[B]1.7[/B] 1. Improved vertical and horizontal scrolling. 2. Added letter scrollbar (by marcelvedt and the Aeon Madnox team!). 3. Added Player.Process dialog for Krypton. 4. Adapted the game controlers file from Eminence 2.5 (needs to be tested). 5. Fixed some small glitches.

[B]1.5.1[/B] 1. Better flags icons and other small fixes.
[B]1.5[/B] 1. Added support for rotating ExtraFanart with Skin Helper! 2. Fixed the Krypton settings screen. 3. Added RottenTomatoes, Metacritic and IMDb ratings to the VideoInfo screen. 4. Updated the Dialogs and added the "Get more..." and "Cancel" buttons. 5. Added the Showcase view from Eminence 2.5! 6. Redesigned the way Video OSD works. 7. Fixed most of the Skin Helper properties. 8. Altered flag aspect ratio. 9. Fixed and improved the movieset display. 10. Redesigned the large submenu. 11. Tweaked the timestamp bubble. 12. Removed the changelog button from the addon info screen. 13. Darkened the interface dffuse graphic. 14. Repaired the subitle offset slider. 15. Modded the way source flags are displayed while playing. 16. Changed the OSD info button function.

extension.summary: eXtended MOD of Confluence skin originally by Jezz_X and CCM by Mudislander.
eXtended MOD of Confluence skin originally by Jezz_X and CCM by Mudislander.
Uitgebreide MOD van Confluence skin origineel door Jezz_X en CCM door Mudislander.
extension.description: Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is een MOD van Confluence om een grotere aanpassingsmogelijkheid te geven ten opzichten van de standaard skin (gebaseerd op Mudislander's CCM).
extension.disclaimer: You break it - You get to keep the pieces
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
Wie zijn billen brandt - moet op de blaren zitten
